title: Getting Started Guide
description: An step by step guide about how to start with the platform, execute the platform in Docker, enter in the ControlPanel, define Devices, Ontologies, create a dashboard,...
detailedDescription:
Documentation about how to install and operate the platform can be found on the **GIT repository**:

[**Platform Documentation**](https://github.com/sofia4cities/sofia4cities/tree/master/docs)

That section includes the open documentation of the platform. Among others you can find:

- Architecture Overview of the Platform, with explanation of the modules, executables, third-party libraries, HA,...
- Getting Started a Guide about how to start with the platform, execute the platform in Docker, enter in the ControlPanel, define Devices, Ontologies, create a dashboard,...
- How to contribute description of the easy rules to follow to contribute to the evolution of the platform

The Getting Started Guide is accesible via this [**Link**](https://github.com/sofia4cities/sofia4cities/tree/master/docs/getting-started)
